Master's degree in Research in Behaviour and Cognition (Universtat de Barcelona; 2016-2017)

PhD Candidate under the trainee of [Joan López-Moliner](http://www.ub.edu/viscagroup/joan/) (Universitat de Barcelona; 2017-202?)
